Class PromptServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.adrain.llm_middleware.service.impl.PromptServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
PromptService
@Service public class PromptServiceImpl extends Object implements PromptService
PromptServiceImpl is the implementation of PromptService that handles creating new PromptResponse objects by communicating with OpenAI API and extracting keywords from the resulting text.

Uses PromptRepository, OpenAiClient, KeywordSearcher and, ResponseService for repository operations, OpenAI requests, keyword extraction and, handling related Responses.

  • Method Details

    • newPrompt

      public PromptResponse newPrompt(PromptRequest request)
      Method either gets a Response from database, or openai depening if a Prompt with similarity score 0.8 or higher exists in database by user. If similar Prompt does not exist in database, prompt is persisted to database.

      Checks if:

      • exists in database.
      Specified by:
      newPrompt in interface PromptService
      Parameters:
      request - The PromptRequest containing the prompt text.
      Returns:
      A PromptResponse containing the completion text and the extracted keywords from database or openai.
